rules_text:
Vigilance, menace, trample, haste
Whenever you cast a spell, you may consume. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Thunderous Avarice. [i](To consume, sacrifice another creature or exile a creature card from your graveyard.)[/i]
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, they may consume. If they don't, put a +1/+1 counter on Thunderous Avarice.
